title: Bug 6536: Add Javadoc on field in TH does nothing
OB: When attempting to add Javadoc on a field in TH, selecting the 'Add Javadoc' option from the context menu does not trigger any action. No Javadoc is added to the field.
EB: When attempting to add Javadoc on a field in TH, selecting the 'Add Javadoc' option from the context menu should trigger the action and add Javadoc to the field.
SR:
1. Open TH.
2. Right-click on a field.
3. From the context menu, select 'Add Javadoc'.
4. Verify that Javadoc is added to the field or an appropriate action is triggered.
